objects.text:
Iconic Star Chevron Logo • Premium Canvas Material • Spacious Compartments
Authentic Chuck Taylor Design • Cushioned Insoles • Perfect for Everyday Style

product_details.name: Converse Ultimate Style Pack - Classic Backpack & Sneaker Combo
product_details.description:
• Sleek black Converse backpack with iconic star chevron logo
• Classic high-top Chuck Taylor All-Star sneaker in timeless black canvas
• Sporty white and grey low-top sneakers for versatile style
• Durable backpack with spacious main compartment and front zip pocket
• Signature white rubber toe cap and sole on high-top sneakers
• Comfortable cushioned insoles in both shoe styles
• Premium quality canvas material for long-lasting wear
• Authentic Converse branding and design elements
• Perfect combination for school, sports, or casual everyday use
• Versatile black and white color scheme matches any outfit

banner_details:
This banner has a bold, urban retail design centered around a dark theme with modern circular and grid graphics in the background. The header section contains a strong brand name (`heading`) in white, followed by a bold red subheading (`tagline`), and a concise product descriptor in white (`subheading`). Centered prominently is the product image (`product_image`), which showcases a backpack and sneakers. Below it, a feature-rich description (`description`) is split over two lines. The price (`price`) appears in large red text to draw immediate attention. The call-to-action button (`cta_background`) uses a bright red background and bold white text (`cta`) to prompt shopping.  

**Color Palette:**  
- #1E1E1E (Charcoal Black)  
- #111111 (Dark Gray-Black)  
- #FFFFFF (White)  
- #E73331 (Vibrant Red)
product_color: This product image features a sleek and minimalistic color palette built around monochrome tones and subtle contrasts. The primary colors observed are jet black (#000000), white (#FFFFFF), cool grey (#A9A9A9), and ivory beige (#F5F5DC). The black backpack serves as the bold backdrop, sharply contrasted by the white Converse logo, creating strong visual hierarchy. The sneakers blend white and grey tones fluidly, providing a fresh and sporty vibe, while the classic black high-top shoes add retro flair with off-white soles and detailed white stitching. This palette is ideal for a banner that emphasizes modern style, versatility, and iconic branding.
